verses.verse: And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; for though thou wast <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H639>me<s%>, thine anger is turned <S%H7725>away<s%> and thou comfortest <S%H5162>me<s%>.

Behold <S%H410><s%>, God is my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>; I will <S%H982>trust<s%>, and will not be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>; for <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, even <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song<s%>; and he is become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Therefore with <S%H8342>joy<s%> shall ye <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4599>wells<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H3045>declare<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, make <S%H2142>mention<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> excellent <S%H1348>things<s%>: let this be <S%H3045>known<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Cry <S%H6670>aloud<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%>, thou <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; for <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee is the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
